name: ARMeshClassification
desc: Enumeration of different classes of real-world objects that ARKit can identify.

items.name: case ceiling
items.desc: The face is a part of a real-world ceiling.

items.desc: The face is a part of a real-world door.

items.name: case floor
items.desc: The face is a part of a real-world floor.

items.name: case seat
items.desc: The face is a part of a real-world seat.

items.name: case table
items.desc: The face is a part of a real-world table.

items.name: case wall
items.desc: The face is a part of a real-world wall.

items.name: case window
items.desc: The face is a part of a real-world window.
